Description: Clay lamp; oval, brown, reddish in places, mica; applied vertical loop-handle, shoulder; wavy branch pattern and raised circles; discus - rosette within branch pattern; nozzle-top; cross and raised circles; undefined flat base.
Bibliographic references: Lamp / Catalogue of the Lamps in the British Museum (Q2253)
Dalton 1901 / Catalogue of Early Christian Antiquities and Objects from the Christian East in the Department of British and Medieval Antiquities and Ethnography of the British Museum (822)
Acquisition name: Purchased from: Rev Greville John Chester
